lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton’s more aggressive stance is just one of several policy differences that could create challenges as the president begins campaigning for her.

headline.print_headline: Obama and Clinton Differ on Terror Approach
headline.main: Clinton Talks Tough on Terror, as Obama Weighs His Words

snippet: Hillary Clinton’s more aggressive stance is just one of several policy differences that could create challenges as the president begins campaigning for her.
abstract: Pres Obama and Hillary Clinton have different approaches to debate on terrorism and how best to bring fight to terrorists, despite how they have moved in lock step to denounce Donald Trump's response to Orlando, Fla, mass shooting; policy differences could present challenges as Pres Obama seeks to campaign for Clinton in general election.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
